name: Deathly Mazes
description: This is my Advanced Programming Topics Final project. Although due to COVID-19 I was not able to achieve my intended goals for this project, I reduced the scope of my game and created this...thing that may or may not be updated and finished to my intended goals. This game is a maze game where you have to complete the maze. you get a "string" that marks where you have been, but be careful, the string starts to disappear after 20 seconds.
